messages.body:
Dear Lou,
Acknowledging the receipt of your email, which was well noted. This is to inform you that we had a meeting with the Delivery Agent office today, so your fund have been packaged as a consignment and for your information the Delivery Agent that will be bringing the consignment down to country is not aware that there is money involve in the consignment and if they does the fund might be diverted, so only you and the bank Director are aware of this development and be advised to keep this a secrete.
So the fund in question, which they want to deliver to you, is $25 Million and your details information's have being forwarded to the Delivery Agent and when they arrive country they will reach you on phone to let you know that they are arrive in country, be advised not to entertain any fear immediately you hear from the Delivery agent.
For your information, note that all relevant documents, which back the consignment, have secured and in tight, so you do not have to worry yourself for any thing. Also be advice to keep the sum of $5,200 dollar with you, because immediately the Delivery Agent arrives they will call you on your phone to meet them for the fee to enable them settle with the airport Authority to clear the consignment at your Airport before it will be delivered to you.
Finally, the Delivery Agent has left today to your country and as soon as they get there they will call you on your mobile number, so do make sure that you are around and keep your phone on. So immediately you reach them you keep in touch with me so that i will advice you on what to do.
Meanwhile,i will advice you to reach me through my direct phone number +234-8035374804 for important discussion.
Thanks and waiting to hear from you.
Mr.Bello Usman
